Property Management Services

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Dolores quo, veritatis, possimus fuga officiis neque amet quae nulla aliquid beatae similique doloremque sapiente provident, molestias iste doloribus. Eaque, hic ipsam?

Tenant Screening

Full criminal & financial background checks as well as rental history and job stability. We make every effort to meet potential tenants in person so we can be sure the property is a good fit for both them and us.

Promotion

Advertising through multiple internet channels, open houses, scheduled showings and cooperation with other agencies.

Property

Lease negotiations, deposit/rent collection, maintenance/repairs, regular 6 month property inspections, notices of demand & evictions. Up-to-date city and county licensing rules & regulations.

Accounting

We use the website Buildium to maintain both tenant and owner information, providing you 24/7 access to copies of all documents, financial records and invoice copies. Tenants can submit repair work orders and communicate with us directly through Buildium. Disbursements to owners are made on the 20th of each month via ACH directly to your bank account.

Market

We perform a RMA (Rental Market Analysis) approximately 60 days prior to a lease ending, so you have the most current information when making important decisions about your investment.

Communication

Regular communication regarding repairs, maintenance issues, tenant issues and inspections. You will be provided a comprehensive report upon each inspection completed.
